name: Run Jump - Tracker Run Around
description:
Imaging you are a little fairy who standing in the closed circle, and then you start to run around the circle, tap to jump above obstacles, finally complete the white line of circle to pass levels.

Perfect jumping time, perfect performance!
Higher levels, more cool skins granted!
Enjoy the hilarious sound effects, awesome music and electric colors.

Are you ready for keeping running and accepting challenges? Download now and experience Tracker Run Around!
